Title: Requires the developmental disabilities advisory council to submit an annual comprehensive summary of information about its activities to the office for people with developmental disabilities' website
Summary: Requires the developmental disabilities advisory council to submit an annual comprehensive summary of information about its activities to the office for people with developmental disabilities' website, in an accessible format.
LawCode: Amd ยง13.05, Ment Hyg L (as proposed in S.7793 & A.7560-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring the developmental disabilities advisory council to submit an annual comprehensive summary of information about its activities to the office for people with developmental disabilities' website
